title: LF Odyssey team to complete missions
body: Me and a friend need a full team to complete some of the missions, we have done the first few, its just ones that require a full team using the same character and the onslaught stuff that we need help with, we are free when ever and also have a discord so drop your summoner name in the comments and ill message you on league.

replies.body: Hi plat 2 here looking to complete 3 aug and 2 aug
Anyone still looking, need 2 augment mission summoner name : ahhhh im on tilt
anyone still looking for people, I need to do the onslaught with 2 augments (summoners name death phoenixx)
Keen to finish as many onslaught missions as I can, and would prefer to do so in a team.
had a couple random groups and it turned out pretty badly. so im keen!

add Johnny Cash.
I've been trying to do this all day
I can help im free tonight
